altername_name: アウトモデリスタ U.S.-tuned
name: Auto Modellista: U.S.-tuned
overview: Auto Modellista U.S. Tuned is a cel-shadded racing game. The GameCube version has a lot of tuning and a customization menu. But even better are two new courses, plus nine new models of six different car brands from "overseas" - specifically from North America manufacturers. The GameCube version has up to two players. The drifting will be adjusted and the game includes some small additions or changes to the replay modes.
